      • register

        public boolean register​(java.lang.String userName,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        java.lang.String position,
                        java.lang.String fullName,
                        java.lang.String emailAddress)
                 throws InvalidRegistration
        Register a new staff member (staff or manager)
        Parameters:
        userName - username
        password - password only a SHA 256 of the password is stored, not the password itself
        position - staff or manager
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if not
        Throws:
        UserNameAlreadyTakenException
        InvalidRegistration
